name: Petz Hamsterz 2
description:
The cuteness factor is off the charts in Petz Hamsterz 2 for Nintendo DS. Pat your hamster, feed your hamster, talk to your hamster, and shower your hamster with gifts, toys, and love!

Features

• Care for up to 12 hamsters including two unlockable rare breeds – and baby hamsters!
• Customize your hamster’s cage with over 200 toys and accessories, plus 34 “treasure” items.
• Play mini-games with your friends or use Nintendo wireless play to visit their cages.
